name: The Darkness [2025 - Seasonal]
identifier: Holds an Evil Character face down
specialability: If a player attacks, you may reveal the character held here: Defending player may add that character to battle. Cannot be negated.

name: Lost Soul "Hopper" [Matthew 18:12] [2025 - Seasonal]
identifier: ["Hopper"] Does not count as a Lost Soul for deck building rules
specialability: If drawn, give this card to an opponent's territory.

name: Samson, Son of Manoah [2025 - State]
identifier: Judge, X = # of cards in hand
specialability: You may discard an animal to prevent Enhancements. If alone, paralyze all Evil Characters with strength X or greater this turn. Cannot be negated.

name: Prince of the Air [2025 - Regional]
specialability: You may play an evil N.T. Fortress from deck or draw 2. You may underdeck up to X cards and/or Lost Souls. Cannot be prevented.

name: David the Unifier [2025 - Seasonal]
identifier: King of Israel and Judah, Musician, Prophet
specialability: If equipped, you may take a good O.T. human warrior from deck. May band to a II Samuel warrior. Cannot be negated.

name: Murderous Command [2025 - 3rd Place]
specialability: You may take an evil Egyptian from deck or Reserve. Discard a Hero in a territory to add an evil Egyptian to battle.

name: Twenty Shekels [2025 - 2nd]
specialability: You may bounce an O.T. human in a territory. You may reveal opponent's hand: Play a character.

name: Redemption [2025 - National]
identifier: X = # of Heroes resurrected by this card
specialability: Resurrect any number of Heroes. You may draw X (limit 3). Convert an evil human in a territory and/or banish an evil non-human in a territory.
